entry.title: $2150 // Very spacious 2 bedroom apartment in Central Bushwick!!
entry.content:
This 2 bedroom/1 bathroom is really terrific, especially with space, light and storage! The important things in life!

The living room is very large, you can do a real living room, couch, TV, bookshelves, table, whatever you want.
The kitchen is newly renovated, appliances are in great condition.

The bedrooms are on opposite sides of the apartment which is great for privacy. They will both fit a queen sized bed with room for other furniture like a chest of drawers or bookshelf or what have you. The each have large closets and big windows.

The neighborhood is Bushwick, really close to numerous bars, restaurants, and coffee shops, and just two blocks away from the L/M lines at Myrtle-Wyckoff!

1 year lease! Good credit required

Text Maddie at show contact info to see the place :)

entry.title: $2395 // ***BRAND NEW HUGE DUPLEX***LOTS OF LIGHT***LAUNDRY AND ROOF TOP***
entry.content:
**THIS HUGE 1 BEDROOM DUPLEX APARTMENT WON'T LAST**

Gorgeous brand new huge apartment, located in the prime Bushwick area. Conveniently located close to the J/M/Z trains and short walk to the L train line, Close to various bus lines for a fast and easy commute. Steps away from many bars restaurants cafes groceries and many shops.
The building is well maintained clean and quiet with a great super on premises,

The apartment features, Brand New, 1 huge bedroom with large windows and lots of natural light, 1.5 modern baths, Huge closets, Huge living room, Central A/C, Hardwood floors, High ceiling, Brand New Kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Microwave, LAUNDRY IN BUILDING, pet friendly and much more. A MUST SEE!!!

For just $2400 a month, with no brokers fee,
For more details & to schedule a private viewing contact Isidore show contact info
